title: yOga samAjam
sahitya:
yOga samAjam ulaga samAjam Om shuddha shaktiyin oLi maNIk-kOyil


anupallavi

  dEha vAzhvai nalla tiruvaruT-kalaiyena sheidiDum amudinai uidiDap-peidiDum


caraNam 1    ulagamE kOyilAi uyirt-toghai sAmiyAi nalam adE orumaiyin nALellAm sEvaiyAi
pala matha orumaiyin paNbinai nATTIyE bhArata shaktiyin vIru peTrOngiDum
    caraNam 2    bhaktiyum dhyAnamum jnAnamum mOnamum paNNuDan paNigaLum eNNaru tozhilgaLum 
nittiyam iyaTriyE nimmatiyAi vAzhum nEyar nalam perugum tUya tava nilaiyum
    caraNam 3    kaDavuLE talaivan kANikkai manamE kani mana sAkSiyE iniyavuLLAsAn
kaDamaiyE sAdhanam karuNai nivEdanam kANuyir kaLittilE kaivalya cEtanam
    caraNam 4    pala kalai pala mozhi pala matham pala tavam pala nilai nADuru paNbari naNban
ilagu shuddhAnandan idayattil ezhund-ulagengilum mangalam pongiDap-polivadu
